label: Books on Protecting Europeans from Organised Crime
description: A selection of titles on protecting Europeans from organised crime available from the European Parliament Library.

list.label: Organised Crime, Financial Crime, and Criminal Justice: Theoretical Concepts and Challenges
The Dark Mafia : Organized Crime in the Age of the Internet.
The Transnational Crime of Human Trafficking : A Human Security Approach
Tax crimes and enforcement in the European Union
The rise of EU police cooperation : governing differentiated integration
Countering Terrorist and Criminal Financing: Theory and Practice
Economic Crime: From Conception to Response
The Private Sector and Organized Crime: Criminal Entrepreneurship, Illicit Profits, and Private Sector Security Governance
